thread.title: What's your favorite programming language?
thread.content: I've been using TypeScript for a while now and I'm loving it. What languages do you all prefer and why?
thread.author: Anonymous

replies.content: Python all the way! It's so versatile and the syntax is clean.
replies.author: Anonymous

replies.content: I'm a big fan of Rust. The performance is great and the compiler catches so many potential bugs.
replies.author: RustFan

replies.content: JavaScript/TypeScript for me. The ecosystem is huge and you can build anything from web apps to mobile to desktop.
replies.author: Anonymous
